Package org.zurdavid.petrinets

Interface IPetrinetController

All Known Implementing Classes:
GraphController
public interface IPetrinetController
The interface provides the methods of the controller, which can be called by the view.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    boundednessAnalysisOnMultipleFiles(File[] files)
    The method performs a boundedness analysis for each file in the passed in array.
    void
    fireTransition(String id)
    If the transition whose id is passed in is enabled it fires, which results in a new marking of the Petri net and possibly expansion of the reachability graph.
    void
    gotoMarking(String marking)
    The Petri nets marking is set to the passed in marking.
    void
    loadPetrinet(File pnml)
    The method loads a Petri net from a pnml file and a new reachability graph is created.
    void
    onAddToken()
    The controller looks up which place is currently selected in the view and adds a token to this place.
    void
    onSubtractToken()
    The controller looks up which place is currently selected in the view and subtracts a token from this place.
    void
    performBoundednessAnalysis()
    A boundedness analysis of the currently loaded Petri net is performed and the results are displayed in the view.
    void
    propertyAnalysis(File[] files)
     
    void
    resetInitialMarking(boolean resetReachabilityGraph, boolean updateView)
    The Petri nets marking is set to its initial marking.
    void
    setView(IPetrinetAppView view)
    Sets the view with which the controller is connected.

  • Method Details

    • setView

      void setView(IPetrinetAppView view)
      Sets the view with which the controller is connected. The method is necessary, because the view needs a reference to the controller at construction, thus the view cannot be set at construction.
      Parameters:
      view - The applications view.

    • loadPetrinet

      void loadPetrinet(File pnml)
      The method loads a Petri net from a pnml file and a new reachability graph is created. The loaded Petri net and the reachabiliy graph are then displayed in the view.
      Parameters:
      pnml - The pnml file to be loaded.

    • onAddToken

      void onAddToken()
      The controller looks up which place is currently selected in the view and adds a token to this place. The resulting marking is set as the current Petri net's new initial marking.

    • onSubtractToken

      void onSubtractToken()
      The controller looks up which place is currently selected in the view and subtracts a token from this place. The resulting marking is set as the Petri net's new initial marking.

    • resetInitialMarking

      void resetInitialMarking(boolean resetReachabilityGraph, boolean updateView)
      The Petri nets marking is set to its initial marking. If the parameter resetReachabilityGraph is true, the current reachability graph is discarded and a new one is created. If the updateView is true, the changes in the model will be displayed in the view.
      Parameters:
      resetReachabilityGraph - If the parameter is true, the current reachability graph is discarded and a new one is created
      updateView - If the parameter is true, the changes in the model will be displayed in the view.

    • performBoundednessAnalysis

      void performBoundednessAnalysis()
      A boundedness analysis of the currently loaded Petri net is performed and the results are displayed in the view.

    • boundednessAnalysisOnMultipleFiles

      void boundednessAnalysisOnMultipleFiles(File[] files)
      The method performs a boundedness analysis for each file in the passed in array. The results are displayed in the text view.
      Parameters:
      files - An array of pnml files.

    • fireTransition

      void fireTransition(String id)
      If the transition whose id is passed in is enabled it fires, which results in a new marking of the Petri net and possibly expansion of the reachability graph. All changes are displayed in the views.
      Parameters:
      id - Id of the transition that should fire.

    • gotoMarking

      void gotoMarking(String marking)
      The Petri nets marking is set to the passed in marking.
      Parameters:
      marking - A String representation of a Marking. See Marking.toString().

    • propertyAnalysis

      void propertyAnalysis(File[] files)
